about_the_game:
Enter the world of "Chased" and see if you can survive the ultimate horror experience. When your computer starts to act up, you think you might have a virus. But things take a turn for the worse when a mysterious stranger offers you the chance to play some games to reset your computer. Little do you know, death in the game also occurs in real life. Can you outsmart the twisted mind behind these deadly games, or will you become the next victim?

In "Chased," you'll need to use all of your wits and cunning to survive. With multiple upcoming levels to explore, each one more terrifying than the last, you'll never know what dangers lurk around the corner. And with more entities waiting to hunt you down, every moment is a fight for survival. Be careful how you spend your limited energy, or you may fall victim to the traps that are waiting to stun you. Crouch to evade them, or face the consequences.

This single-player horror game will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you brave enough to face the challenge? Test your limits and see if you have what it takes to survive "Chased".
